title: Dial Menu Block
body:
Dial Menu Block¶

The Ask Question block is only available when designing a workflow for a voice campaign or when managing a workflow for a phone number .

  1. Place a Dial Menu block in your workflow where desired

  2. Enter a menu name

  3. Click Speak text

    • Keep the greeting “Listen carefully to the following options” or write your own

  4. Alternatively, click Play an audio file

  5. Click Add Option

  6. Enter a number

  7. Add a name

  8. Click Add

  9. To delete an option, click

  10. To edit </users/general/guides/functions_of_the_grid/how_to_edit.html>`_ an option, click

  11. If desired, click Add Option again

  12. Click Respond to hash (#) or Respond to star (*) if you would like recipients to be able to press the hash and star

  13. Click Done
